title: How do I set a custom audio file as the ringtone or notification tone?
answer:
Go to Settings. Touch Sound then Phone ringtone or Notification tone. On the Music tab, select a tone and touch APPLY. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112843) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=112844)
